attributes.action: Lower all motorists vehicle insurance by 50%
attributes.additional_details: the mistakes of other road users should not effect other drivers premium
attributes.background: help people (new drivers especially) not have to spend every last pence on car insurance

rejection.details:
Decisions about prices for motor insurance are a matter for insurers, not the UK Government or Parliament, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Place a Cap on Motor Insurance Premium Increases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649918

Create a state-owned car insurance provider: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/656026

Hold a Public Inquiry into the increasing cost of car insurance in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/660820
